attributes.action: Invest more in the cleaning and  preservation of Britain’s seashores.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain’s coast lines and seashores are becoming ever more unclean and eroded by holiday-makers , lazy councils that cant be bothered to put the time nor money into keeping the sands of Britain pleasant. 

Bear cans, cigarette ends, furniture, glass and even chemical barrows are floating on British seashores and embedded in its sands. 

 Thus we ask the Prime Minister to make it a legal obligation for all councillors to make sure the shores and sands in there jurisdiction are kept clean, hygienic and healthy.
